Dear both,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

On August 7th we experienced a water leak from the ceiling caused by broken valves which resulted in flooding along one of the main walls. 

 

We had sent garments to the laundry for inspection and cleaning. Unfortunately 13 of these items were found to be damaged due to the water leak.

 

Please find attached a list of the damaged garments along with corresponding images for your reference.

 

We are hoping this damage can be redeemed through insurance. Kindly let us know if any further documentation or details are needed to support the claim.

 

Regards,

 

Raouf A Rahim

Store Manager | Polo Ralph Lauren

Place Vendome, Qatar

Qatar Luxury Co.

Thank you for your patience and follow-up regarding the water leak incident at the Polo Ralph Lauren store in Place Vendome, Qatar.

To proceed with the insurance claim and ensure a comprehensive assessment, please find below the list of required documents and actions:

Required Documentation:


*	
	Mall Incident Report: Kindly share the official report issued by the mall management detailing the cause, date, and extent of the water leak.
*	
	Lease Agreement Copy: Please provide a copy of the lease agreement for the affected store to verify tenancy terms and responsibilities.
*	
	Landed Cost of Damaged Products: A breakdown of the landed cost for each of the 13 damaged garments is needed. This will help determine the quantum of the loss, as claims are typically settled based on landed cost.
*	
	Related Invoices: Include purchase invoices for the damaged items to support the valuation.
*	
	Cleaning & Restoration Invoices: If the damaged shirts can be professionally cleaned and restored to a saleable condition, please provide the cleaning service invoices
*	
	Repair & Repainting Quotations: For any material repairs or repainting costs exceeding QAR 2,000, please submit at least two competing quotations for any relevant repair service requirement.


Contact Details in case surveyor is assigned:


*	
	In case a surveyor is appointed, kindly confirm the contact person who will coordinate the site visit:

	*	
		Name:
	*	
		Designation:
	*	
		Mobile Number:


Mall Responsibility & Communication:
